name: Hype Music Mix
tag_list: music, indie, artist, hiphop, rap, mixtapes
overview:
Hype Music Mix gives you a chance to become a featured artist to help spread the word about your groups music, videos, news and songs. Our system is based on popularity, votes and everyone has the opportunity to become #1 at Hype Music Mix.

Hype Music Mix is the world’s best online music social network marketing company utilized by Artists, DJâ€™s, Record Labels, Promoters, Managers, Venues and Fans in order to collaborate, promote music and to grow Artist fan base.

We provide free and affordable services to individual artists and music industry professionals by providing them support in the areas of web promotion, fan reach, digital distribution, social media marketing, concert events and promotion.

Hype Music Mix helps virtually every genre artist and music industry professionals increase their revenues and provide alternative solutions to reach their targeted audience in order to brand their name within the Music Industry.
